item.title: HTTPS Required
item.description: Its 2017, and we’re halfway to encrypting the entire internet. Source: https://letsencrypt.org/stats/ This is huge. Our internet communications are becoming more encrypted every day using HTTPS, also known as HTTP over TLS/SSL or HTTP Secure. The free Certificate Authority, Let’s Encrypt, is partly responsible because of their free service.
